Finger Bass YR
--------------

Version 2019-09-30

Sound samples created by Andrea Biasior <reusenoise@gmail.com> from a Yamaha
RBX bass guitar. It was sent for inclusion in FreePats on September 2019,
under the terms of the Creative Commons CC0 public domain dedication:
https://creativecommons.org/publicdomain/zero/1.0/

Some small edits to the samples and sound banks were made by Roberto
<roberto@zenvoid.org> for integration with other sound banks in the FreePats
project.

http://freepats.zenvoid.org/ElectricGuitar/clean-electric-bass.html#BassYR
